data.question: What is the chemical formula for mmen-Mn2(dobpdc)?
data.answer: C22H30N4O6Mn2

data.question: What technique was used for high-resolution synchrotron X-ray powder diffraction data collection?
data.answer: Beamline 11-BM at the Advanced Photon Source (APS), Argonne National Laboratory

data.question: What is the space group assigned for mmen-Mn2(dobpdc) based on powder X-ray diffraction analysis?
What functional was used in the periodic DFT calculations for the energetics of CO2 capture?
data.answer: PBE and M06L functionals

data.question: What is the main feature of the N K-edge NEXAFS spectra indicating CO2 insertion into the metal–nitrogen bond?
data.answer: The pre-edge peak at 402.3 eV

data.question: Is the adsorption of CO2 in mmen-Mg2(dobpdc) reversible?
data.answer: Yes, desorption hysteresis was minimal indicating reversibility.

data.question: Does the presence of water affect the CO2 adsorption isotherms for mmen-Mg2(dobpdc)?
data.answer: No, no changes in the CO2 adsorption isotherms were apparent from exposure of the sample to water.

data.question: What is the effect of increasing temperature on the adsorption of water in mmen-Mg2(dobpdc)?
data.answer: The adsorption of water decreases with increasing temperature.

data.question: What is the role of Mg2+ in the mechanism of CO2 adsorption in mmen-Mg2(dobpdc)?
data.answer: Mg2+ is essential for the reactivity for CO2 fixation at very low CO2 concentrations, similar to its role in the Rubisco enzyme.

data.question: Can mmen-Mg2(dobpdc) efficiently capture CO2 from gas mixtures containing water vapor?
data.answer: Yes, mmen-Mg2(dobpdc) retains its affinity for CO2 under humid conditions.

data.question: What is the regeneration energy for mmen-Mg2(dobpdc) compared to monoethanolamine?
data.answer: The regeneration energy for mmen-Mg2(dobpdc) is lower than that for monoethanolamine.

data.question: What is the working capacity of mmen-Mg2(dobpdc) when cycled between 100 and 150 °C?
data.answer: The working capacity of mmen-Mg2(dobpdc) is in excess of 13 wt%.

data.question: Does the mmen-M2(dobpdc) series exhibit stepped adsorption isotherms for CO2?
data.answer: Yes, except for mmen-Ni2(dobpdc) which shows Langmuir-type adsorption behaviour.

data.question: What is the effect of the metal ion on the position of the CO2 adsorption step in the mmen-M2(dobpdc) series?
data.answer: The position of the CO2 adsorption step varies with the metal ion, in accordance with the metal-amine bond strength.

data.question: What is the significance of the cooperative insertion mechanism for CO2 adsorption in mmen-M2(dobpdc)?
data.answer: It leads to the sudden uptake of a large amount of CO2 and a steep vertical step in the adsorption isotherm.

data.question: Is the CO2 adsorption mechanism in mmen-M2(dobpdc) similar to any biological processes?
data.answer: Yes, it is structurally similar to the CO2 fixation mechanism in the Rubisco enzyme.

data.question: What is the role of the uncoordinated amine groups in mmen-M2(dobpdc) for CO2 adsorption?
data.answer: The uncoordinated amine groups act as strong bases to remove the acidic proton from the metal-bound amine, facilitating CO2 adsorption.

data.question: What experimental technique was used to determine the structural changes upon CO2 adsorption in mmen-Mn2(dobpdc)?
data.answer: Powder X-ray diffraction analysis was used.

data.question: What computational method was used to simulate the N K-edge NEXAFS spectra for mmen-Mg2(dobpdc)?
data.answer: Density Functional Theory (DFT) calculations were used.

data.question: Is the adsorption of CO2 in mmen-M2(dobpdc) a thermodynamically spontaneous process at low pressures?
data.answer: No, the adsorption of CO2 is not thermodynamically spontaneous at low pressures due to the large decrease in entropy associated with the transition.
